attributes.additional_details:
As most of you may be aware of the subject regarding issues within Palestine but for those who are not aware, innocent children are put into prisonment and are crucially beaten up by the army and also resulting in innocent people being killed. British intervention is now urgently needed to protect these innocent lives.

We need to think about the Palestinians, with no power, no defence, and no way out other than death. By the British contribute,not only are we proving how supportive we are, but more importantly lives could be saved of those who don't deserve to be killed, isn't innocent people gaining justice a free right?
